org.icij.datashare.text.nlp.open

Class OpenNlpPipeline

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.icij.datashare.text.nlp.AbstractNlpPipeline
      • org.icij.datashare.text.nlp.open.OpenNlpPipeline
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NlpPipeline

    public final class OpenNlpPipeline
extends AbstractNlpPipeline
    NlpPipeline AbstractNlpPipeline Type#OPEN Apache OpenNLP Models v1.5 English, Spanish (English used for TOKEN and SENTENCE), German, French (English used for NER) Created by julien on 3/29/16.
